fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Restock someone's materials at night. They get an extra charge of any ability with limited uses. Can be used on any player. When used on the Creator (3946), they get 1 bit. You can only restock twice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If a player rolls Supplier and there is currently no Leader, turn said player into the Leader.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all that would oppose you. (Wins with Institution and Neutral Benign).

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
The Supplier restored one your abilities. You got an extra charge of \_\_\_\_\_\_!
The Supplier provided you with extra materials for your masterpiece. You got 1 bit. (Used on Creator)
